charges.charge_disposition: The Defendant Plead Guilty to Count 1, 2 And 3 of The Indictment on 10/11/05. Imprisonment Term: 37 Months on Counts 1, 2, And 3, to be Served Concurrently. The Defendant is Remanded to The Custody of Usm. Supervised Release: 3 Years. Standard Conditions of Supervision. Additional Conditions of Supervised Release. $300.00 Msa. no Fine. no Restitution.

charges.charge_description: Controlled Substance - Sell, Distribute, OR Dispense (2-3)

charges.charge_disposition: The Defendant Plead Guilty to Count 1, 2 And 3 of The Indictment on 10/11/05. Imprisonment Term: 37 Months on Counts 1, 2, And 3, to be Served Concurrently. The Defendant is Remanded to The Custody of Usm. Supervised Release: 3 Years. Standard Conditions of Supervision. Additional Conditions of Supervised Release. $300.00 Msa. no Fine. no Restitution.

The Defendant Pleaded Guilty on October 11, 2005, to Counts 1 And 10 of The Superseding Indictment in Case No. 05-06011-06-Cr-Sj-Nkl And to Count 1 of The Indictment in Case No. 05-06010-02-Cr-Sj-Nkl. Bold Text:imprisonment - The Defendant is Hereby Committed to The Custody of The United States Bureau of Prisons to be Imprisoned For A Total Term of 30 Months on Counts 1 And 10 in Case No. 05-06011-06-Cr-Sj-Nkl And Count 1 in Case No. 05-06010-02-Cr-Sj-Nkl, to be Served Concurrently. The Court Recommends to The Bureau of Prisons That The Defendant be Placed at an Institution For Participation in The 500 Hour Drug Treatment Program. The Defendant is Remanded to The Custody of The United States Marshal. Bold Text:supervised Release - Upon Release From Imprisonment, The Defendant Shall be on Supervised Release For A Term of 3 Years. This Consists of 3 Years on Each of Counts 1 And 10 in Case No. 05-06011-06-Cr-Sj-Nkl And Count 1 in Case No. 05-06010-02-Cr-Sj-Nkl, to be Served Concurrently. Standard And Special Conditions of Supervision Are Requested. Bold Text:criminal Monetary Penalties Msa $300 ($100.00 Each Count in Case Nos. 05-06011-06-Cr-Sj-Nkl And 05-06010-02-Cr-Sj-Nkl). no Fine. no Restitution

charges.charge_description: Controlled Substance - Sell, Distribute, OR Dispense (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on The Motion of The United States.
